pr_title: fix #2314 Add How to read marbles appendix to refguide

timeline.bodyText: The include is guarded by the ifeval, is that on purpose?
timeline.author: ericbottard

replies.bodyText: (it was on purpose to completely skip that appendix in the PDF when I couldn't find a way to have all graphics render, but now that issue has been fixed)
replies.author: simonbasle

timeline.message:
fix #2314 Add How to read marbles appendix to refguide

The svg legends are extracted from conventions.svg and reworked so as
to be more useful from a reader's perspective.

[build] Allow forcing pdf refguide rendering (see #2314)

By adding the `-PforcePdf` to the Gradle command line, the pdf rendering
of docs is forced even if the version is a snapshot/is not built on CI.
